base_description: Round, black-framed glasses with gray lenses.
part_description: Two circular gray lenses, black frame, and two black arms extending from the frame sides.
internal_interaction_description: The lenses are securely fitted within the round frames, which are connected by a bridge. The arms are hinged to the frame, allowing them to fold inward for storage and outward to fit on a face.
external_interaction_description: The glasses are worn on the face, resting on the nose and ears. They interact with light, allowing the wearer to see clearly by correcting vision or reducing glare. They can be placed on surfaces or stored in cases when not in use.
